title: 135 KEY Differences Between JUSTICE LEAGUE (2017) and ZACK SNYDER'S JUSTICE LEAGUE (2021).
author: Think Story
comment:
🦇 Wow, this video took me a long time to do, but it was a blast to put together. What did you think of the Snyder cut and how it changed from the original 2017 Justice League?  🦇

OMG I CALLED DEATHSTROKE, DEAD SHOT ahhhhhhh
Single biggest improvement is that Steppenwolf is actually menacing, and not a cardboard cutout from a children’s magazine.
Great review, I really needed this.
The Snyder Cut was the first DC Movie that left me actually WANTING to see the Sequel. And now I'm more pissed that we'll never get to see it.
My favorite part in ZSCJL is when they cut Joss Whedon name in the credits.
description:
In this video we take a look at some of the major differences between Justice League 2017 and Zack Snyder's Justice League released on HBO Max in 2021. Offering side by side comparisons and insight into the biggest differences between the two versions.
